02489                        getMinimizerIndex(node[3], processEdgeMask[dir][3]),
02490                        getMinimizerIndex(node[2], processEdgeMask[dir][2])
02491                       };
02492                        num = 4;
02493                     */
02494                     int vind[2];
02495                     int seq[4] = {0,1,3,2};
02496                     for(int k = 0; k < 4; k ++)
02497                     {
02498                         getMinimizerIndices((LeafNode*)(node[seq[k]]), processEdgeMask[dir][seq[k]], vind);
02499                         ind[num] = vind[0]; 
02500                         num ++;
02501                     
02502                         if(vind[1] != -1)
02503                         {
02504                             ind[num] = vind[1]; 
02505                             num ++;
02506                             if(flip == 0)
02507                             {
02508                                 ind[num-1] = vind[0];
02509                                 ind[num-2] = vind[1];
02510                             }
02511                         }
02512                     }
02513 
02514                     /* we don't use the manifold option, but if it is
02515                        ever enabled again note that it can output
02516                        non-quads */
02517                 }
02518                 else {
02519                     if(flip) {
02520                         ind[0] = getMinimizerIndex((LeafNode*)(node[2]));
02521                         ind[1] = getMinimizerIndex((LeafNode*)(node[3]));
02522                         ind[2] = getMinimizerIndex((LeafNode*)(node[1]));
02523                         ind[3] = getMinimizerIndex((LeafNode*)(node[0]));
02524                     }
02525                     else {
02526                         ind[0] = getMinimizerIndex((LeafNode*)(node[0]));
02527                         ind[1] = getMinimizerIndex((LeafNode*)(node[1]));
02528                         ind[2] = getMinimizerIndex((LeafNode*)(node[3]));
02529                         ind[3] = getMinimizerIndex((LeafNode*)(node[2]));
02530                     }
02531                     
02532                     add_quad(output_mesh, ind);
02533                 }
02534                 /*
02535                 if(outType == 0)
02536                 {
02537                     // OFF
02538 
02539                     num =(color ? -num : num);
02540 
02541                     fprintf(fout, "%d ", num);
02542 
02543                     if(flip)
02544                     {
02545                         for(int k = num - 1; k >= 0; k --)
02546                         {
02547                             fprintf(fout, "%d ", ind[k]);
02548                         }
02549                     }
02550                     else
02551                     {
02552                         for(int k = 0; k < num; k ++)
02553                         {
02554                             fprintf(fout, "%d ", ind[k]);
02555                         }
02556                     }
02557 
02558                     fprintf(fout, "\n");
02559 
02560                     actualQuads ++;
02561                 }
02562                 else if(outType == 1)
02563                 {
02564                     // PLY
02565 
02566                     if(flip)
02567                     {
02568                         int tind[8];
02569                         for(int k = num - 1; k >= 0; k --)
02570                         {
02571                             tind[k] = ind[num-1-k];
02572                         }
02573                         // PLYWriter::writeFace(fout, num, tind);
02574                     }
02575                     else
02576                     {
02577                             // PLYWriter::writeFace(fout, num, ind);
02578                     }
02579 
02580                     actualQuads ++;
02581                     }*/
02582             }
02583             return;
02584         }
02585         else
02586         {
02587             return;
02588         }
02589     }
02590 }
02591 
02592 
02593 void Octree::edgeProcContour(Node* node[4], int leaf[4], int depth[4], int maxdep, int dir)
02594 {
02595     if(!(node[0] && node[1] && node[2] && node[3]))
02596     {
02597         return;
02598     }
02599     if(leaf[0] && leaf[1] && leaf[2] && leaf[3])
02600     {
02601         processEdgeWrite(node, depth, maxdep, dir);
02602     }
02603     else
02604     {
02605         int i, j;
02606         Node* chd[4][8];
02607         for(j = 0; j < 4; j ++)
02608         {
02609             for(i = 0; i < 8; i ++)
02610             {
02611                 chd[j][i] = ((!leaf[j]) && hasChild(&node[j]->internal, i)) ?
02612                     getChild(&node[j]->internal,
02613                              getChildCount(&node[j]->internal, i)) : NULL;
02614             }
02615         }
02616 
02617         // 2 edge calls
02618         Node* ne[4];
02619         int le[4];
02620         int de[4];
02621         for(i = 0; i < 2; i ++)
02622         {
02623             int c[4] = {edgeProcEdgeMask[dir][i][0], 
02624                            edgeProcEdgeMask[dir][i][1], 
02625                            edgeProcEdgeMask[dir][i][2], 
02626                            edgeProcEdgeMask[dir][i][3]};
02627 
02628             for(int j = 0; j < 4; j ++)
02629             {
02630                 if(leaf[j])
02631                 {
02632                     le[j] = leaf[j];
02633                     ne[j] = node[j];
02634                     de[j] = depth[j];
02635                 }
02636                 else
02637                 {
02638                     le[j] = isLeaf(&node[j]->internal, c[j]);
02639                     ne[j] = chd[j][c[j]];
02640                     de[j] = depth[j] - 1;
02641                 }
02642             }
02643 
02644             edgeProcContour(ne, le, de, maxdep - 1, edgeProcEdgeMask[dir][i][4]);
02645         }
02646 
02647     }
02648 }
02649 
02650 void Octree::faceProcContour(Node* node[2], int leaf[2], int depth[2], int maxdep, int dir)
02651 {
02652     if(!(node[0] && node[1]))
02653     {
02654         return;
02655     }
02656 
02657     if(!(leaf[0] && leaf[1]))
02658     {
02659         int i, j;
02660         // Fill children nodes
02661         Node* chd[2][8];
02662         for(j = 0; j < 2; j ++)
02663         {
02664             for(i = 0; i < 8; i ++)
02665             {
02666                 chd[j][i] =((!leaf[j]) && hasChild(&node[j]->internal, i)) ?
02667                     getChild(&node[j]->internal,
02668                              getChildCount(&node[j]->internal, i)) : NULL;
02669             }
02670         }
02671 
02672         // 4 face calls
02673         Node* nf[2];
02674         int df[2];
02675         int lf[2];
02676         for(i = 0; i < 4; i ++)
02677         {
02678             int c[2] = {faceProcFaceMask[dir][i][0], faceProcFaceMask[dir][i][1]};
02679             for(int j = 0; j < 2; j ++)
02680             {
02681                 if(leaf[j])
02682                 {
02683                     lf[j] = leaf[j];
02684                     nf[j] = node[j];
02685                     df[j] = depth[j];
02686                 }
02687                 else
02688                 {
02689                     lf[j] = isLeaf(&node[j]->internal, c[j]);
02690                     nf[j] = chd[j][c[j]];
02691                     df[j] = depth[j] - 1;
02692                 }
02693             }
02694             faceProcContour(nf, lf, df, maxdep - 1, faceProcFaceMask[dir][i][2]);
02695         }
02696 
02697         // 4 edge calls
02698         int orders[2][4] = {{0, 0, 1, 1}, {0, 1, 0, 1}};
02699         Node* ne[4];
02700         int le[4];
02701         int de[4];
02702             
02703         for(i = 0; i < 4; i ++)
02704         {
02705             int c[4] = {faceProcEdgeMask[dir][i][1], faceProcEdgeMask[dir][i][2],
02706                          faceProcEdgeMask[dir][i][3], faceProcEdgeMask[dir][i][4]};
02707             int* order = orders[faceProcEdgeMask[dir][i][0]];
02708 
02709             for(int j = 0; j < 4; j ++)
02710             {
02711                 if(leaf[order[j]])
02712                 {
02713                     le[j] = leaf[order[j]];
02714                     ne[j] = node[order[j]];
02715                     de[j] = depth[order[j]];
02716                 }
02717                 else
02718                 {
02719                     le[j] = isLeaf(&node[order[j]]->internal, c[j]);
02720                     ne[j] = chd[order[j]][c[j]];
02721                     de[j] = depth[order[j]] - 1;
02722                 }
02723             }
02724 
02725             edgeProcContour(ne, le, de, maxdep - 1, faceProcEdgeMask[dir][i][5]);
02726         }
02727     }
02728 }
02729 
02730 
02731 void Octree::cellProcContour(Node* node, int leaf, int depth)
02732 {
02733     if(node == NULL)
02734     {
02735         return;
02736     }
02737 
02738     if(! leaf)
02739     {
02740         int i;
02741 
02742         // Fill children nodes
02743         Node* chd[8];
02744         for(i = 0; i < 8; i ++)
02745         {
02746             chd[i] =((!leaf) && hasChild(&node->internal, i)) ?
02747                 getChild(&node->internal,
02748                          getChildCount(&node->internal, i)) : NULL;
02749         }
02750 
02751         // 8 Cell calls
02752         for(i = 0; i < 8; i ++)
02753         {
02754             cellProcContour(chd[i], isLeaf(&node->internal, i), depth - 1);
02755         }
02756 
02757         // 12 face calls
02758         Node* nf[2];
02759         int lf[2];
02760         int df[2] = {depth - 1, depth - 1};
02761         for(i = 0; i < 12; i ++)
02762         {
02763             int c[2] = {cellProcFaceMask[i][0], cellProcFaceMask[i][1]};
02764 
02765             lf[0] = isLeaf(&node->internal, c[0]);
02766             lf[1] = isLeaf(&node->internal, c[1]);
02767 
02768             nf[0] = chd[c[0]];
02769             nf[1] = chd[c[1]];
02770 
02771             faceProcContour(nf, lf, df, depth - 1, cellProcFaceMask[i][2]);
02772         }
02773 
02774         // 6 edge calls
02775         Node* ne[4];
02776         int le[4];
02777         int de[4] = {depth - 1, depth - 1, depth - 1, depth - 1};
02778         for(i = 0; i < 6; i ++)
02779         {
02780             int c[4] = {cellProcEdgeMask[i][0], cellProcEdgeMask[i][1], cellProcEdgeMask[i][2], cellProcEdgeMask[i][3]};
02781 
02782             for(int j = 0; j < 4; j ++)
02783             {
02784                 le[j] = isLeaf(&node->internal, c[j]);
02785                 ne[j] = chd[c[j]];
02786             }
02787 
02788             edgeProcContour(ne, le, de, depth - 1, cellProcEdgeMask[i][4]);
02789         }
02790     }
02791     
02792 }
02793 
02794 void Octree::processEdgeParity(LeafNode* node[4], int depth[4], int maxdep, int dir)
02795 {
02796     int con = 0;
02797     for(int i = 0; i < 4; i ++)
02798     {
02799         // Minimal cell
02800         // if(op == 0)
02801         {
02802             if(getEdgeParity(node[i], processEdgeMask[dir][i]))
02803             {
02804                 con = 1;
02805                 break;
02806             }
02807         }
02808     }
02809 
02810     if(con == 1)
02811     {
02812         for(int i = 0; i < 4; i ++)
02813         {
02814             setEdge(node[i], processEdgeMask[dir][i]);
02815         }
02816     }
02817     
02818 }
02819 
02820 void Octree::edgeProcParity(Node* node[4], int leaf[4], int depth[4], int maxdep, int dir)
02821 {
02822     if(!(node[0] && node[1] && node[2] && node[3]))
02823     {
02824         return;
02825     }
02826     if(leaf[0] && leaf[1] && leaf[2] && leaf[3])
02827     {
02828         processEdgeParity((LeafNode**)node, depth, maxdep, dir);
02829     }
02830     else
02831     {
02832         int i, j;
02833         Node* chd[4][8];
02834         for(j = 0; j < 4; j ++)
02835         {
02836             for(i = 0; i < 8; i ++)
02837             {
02838                 chd[j][i] =((!leaf[j]) && hasChild(&node[j]->internal, i)) ?
02839                     getChild(&node[j]->internal, getChildCount(&node[j]->internal, i)) : NULL;
02840             }
02841         }
02842 
02843         // 2 edge calls
02844         Node* ne[4];
02845         int le[4];
02846         int de[4];
02847         for(i = 0; i < 2; i ++)
02848         {
02849             int c[4] = {edgeProcEdgeMask[dir][i][0], 
02850                            edgeProcEdgeMask[dir][i][1], 
02851                            edgeProcEdgeMask[dir][i][2], 
02852                            edgeProcEdgeMask[dir][i][3]};
02853 
02854             // int allleaf = 1;
02855             for(int j = 0; j < 4; j ++)
02856             {
02857 
02858                 if(leaf[j])
02859                 {
02860                     le[j] = leaf[j];
02861                     ne[j] = node[j];
02862                     de[j] = depth[j];
02863                 }
02864                 else
02865                 {
02866                     le[j] = isLeaf(&node[j]->internal, c[j]);
02867                     ne[j] = chd[j][c[j]];
02868                     de[j] = depth[j] - 1;
02869 
02870                 }
02871 
02872             }
02873 
02874             edgeProcParity(ne, le, de, maxdep - 1, edgeProcEdgeMask[dir][i][4]);
02875         }
02876 
02877     }
02878 }
02879 
02880 void Octree::faceProcParity(Node* node[2], int leaf[2], int depth[2], int maxdep, int dir)
02881 {
02882     if(!(node[0] && node[1]))
02883     {
02884         return;
02885     }
02886 
02887     if(!(leaf[0] && leaf[1]))
02888     {
02889         int i, j;
02890         // Fill children nodes
02891         Node* chd[2][8];
02892         for(j = 0; j < 2; j ++)
02893         {
02894             for(i = 0; i < 8; i ++)
02895             {
02896                 chd[j][i] =((!leaf[j]) && hasChild(&node[j]->internal, i)) ?
02897                     getChild(&node[j]->internal,
02898                              getChildCount(&node[j]->internal, i)) : NULL;
02899             }
02900         }
02901 
02902         // 4 face calls
02903         Node* nf[2];
02904         int df[2];
02905         int lf[2];
02906         for(i = 0; i < 4; i ++)
02907         {
02908             int c[2] = {faceProcFaceMask[dir][i][0], faceProcFaceMask[dir][i][1]};
02909             for(int j = 0; j < 2; j ++)
02910             {
02911                 if(leaf[j])
02912                 {
02913                     lf[j] = leaf[j];
02914                     nf[j] = node[j];
02915                     df[j] = depth[j];
02916                 }
02917                 else
02918                 {
02919                     lf[j] = isLeaf(&node[j]->internal, c[j]);
02920                     nf[j] = chd[j][c[j]];
02921                     df[j] = depth[j] - 1;
02922                 }
02923             }
02924             faceProcParity(nf, lf, df, maxdep - 1, faceProcFaceMask[dir][i][2]);
02925         }
02926 
02927         // 4 edge calls
02928         int orders[2][4] = {{0, 0, 1, 1}, {0, 1, 0, 1}};
02929         Node* ne[4];
02930         int le[4];
02931         int de[4];
02932             
02933         for(i = 0; i < 4; i ++)
02934         {
02935             int c[4] = {faceProcEdgeMask[dir][i][1], faceProcEdgeMask[dir][i][2],
02936                          faceProcEdgeMask[dir][i][3], faceProcEdgeMask[dir][i][4]};
02937             int* order = orders[faceProcEdgeMask[dir][i][0]];
02938 
02939             for(int j = 0; j < 4; j ++)
02940             {
02941                 if(leaf[order[j]])
02942                 {
02943                     le[j] = leaf[order[j]];
02944                     ne[j] = node[order[j]];
02945                     de[j] = depth[order[j]];
02946                 }
02947                 else
02948                 {
02949                     le[j] = isLeaf((InternalNode*)(node[order[j]]), c[j]);
02950                     ne[j] = chd[order[j]][c[j]];
02951                     de[j] = depth[order[j]] - 1;
02952                 }
02953             }
02954 
02955             edgeProcParity(ne, le, de, maxdep - 1, faceProcEdgeMask[dir][i][5]);
02956         }
02957     }
02958 }

02961 void Octree::cellProcParity(Node* node, int leaf, int depth)
02962 {
02963     if(node == NULL)
02964     {
02965         return;
02966     }
02967 
02968     if(! leaf)
02969     {
02970         int i;
02971 
02972         // Fill children nodes
02973         Node* chd[8];
02974         for(i = 0; i < 8; i ++)
02975         {
02976             chd[i] =((!leaf) && hasChild((InternalNode*)node, i)) ?
02977                 getChild((InternalNode*)node,
02978                          getChildCount((InternalNode*)node, i)) : NULL;
02979         }
02980 
02981         // 8 Cell calls
02982         for(i = 0; i < 8; i ++)
02983         {
02984             cellProcParity(chd[i], isLeaf((InternalNode*)node, i), depth - 1);
02985         }
02986 
02987         // 12 face calls
02988         Node* nf[2];
02989         int lf[2];
02990         int df[2] = {depth - 1, depth - 1};
02991         for(i = 0; i < 12; i ++)
02992         {
02993             int c[2] = {cellProcFaceMask[i][0], cellProcFaceMask[i][1]};
02994 
02995             lf[0] = isLeaf((InternalNode*)node, c[0]);
02996             lf[1] = isLeaf((InternalNode*)node, c[1]);
02997 
02998             nf[0] = chd[c[0]];
02999             nf[1] = chd[c[1]];
03000 
03001             faceProcParity(nf, lf, df, depth - 1, cellProcFaceMask[i][2]);
03002         }
03003 
03004         // 6 edge calls
03005         Node* ne[4];
03006         int le[4];
03007         int de[4] = {depth - 1, depth - 1, depth - 1, depth - 1};
03008         for(i = 0; i < 6; i ++)
03009         {
03010             int c[4] = {cellProcEdgeMask[i][0], cellProcEdgeMask[i][1], cellProcEdgeMask[i][2], cellProcEdgeMask[i][3]};
03011 
03012             for(int j = 0; j < 4; j ++)
03013             {
03014                 le[j] = isLeaf((InternalNode*)node, c[j]);
03015                 ne[j] = chd[c[j]];
03016             }
03017 
03018             edgeProcParity(ne, le, de, depth - 1, cellProcEdgeMask[i][4]);
03019         }
03020     }
03021     
03022 }
